comments.author: Anne
comments.content: Rock on, Michael! When's your guest spot on Martha Stewart? ;)

comments.author: Kelly
comments.content: That's awesome!  Congrats.  Do you also post recipes there.  I used to use it a lot when I was first starting to cook but admit I haven't been there in awhile.

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN">
I haven't been in the habit of it, but since you can post recipes with links back to your blog post, I might start doing it more. Nice folks over there!
